content: length to be used as a loop for your ornament your ornament is ready enjoy orna-mitts 2023 by elena maltseva december 2023 # 1 orna-mitts 2023 by elena maltseva december 2023 # 2 in rounds 24-27 knit with 3 colors in a row or knit with white and cocoa colors and use duplicate stitch technique to add stitches in red after completing round 30 orna-mitts 2023 by elena maltseva december 2023 #3 orna-mitts 2023 by elena maltseva december 2023 # 4 orna-mitts 2023 by elena maltseva december 2023 # 5 orna-mitts 2023 by elena maltseva december 2023 # 6 orna-mitts 2023 by elena maltseva december 2023 # 7 before you start measure about 6 15 cm of your contrast color split that piece in two as you get to round 26 attach one piece of this yarn to the inside of the ornament behind the spider then bring the thread to the right side of the ornament as you continue to knit begin connecting the spider to the top of the ornament see photo in the symbols for reference orna-mitts 2023 by elena maltseva december 2023 # 8 before you start measure about 6 15 cm of your contrast color split that piece in two as you get to round 27 attach one piece of this yarn to the inside of the ornament behind the first spider and the second piece behind the other spider now bring the threads to the right side of the ornament as you continue to knit begin connecting the spiders to the webs see photo in the symbols for reference orna-mitts 2023 by elena maltseva december 2023 # 9 orna-mitts 2023 by elena maltseva december 2023 # 10 orna-mitts 2023 by elena maltseva december 2023 # 11
